ref.mixed-citation: Rana DR, Dulal S. Therapeutic application of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine in clinical trials for COVID-19: a systematic review. medRxiv. Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory Press; 2020;2020.03.22.20040964. This is a systematic review of the first published clinical trials on hydroxychloroquine for COVID-19 treatment. This article clearly describes what a cytokine storm is about.
